title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1153.2 - Open fires
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1153.2 - Open fires

State Regulations

No person shall start any open fire of any type, including
flare pots, torches or fires in containers formerly used for oil, paint, and
similar materials at any terminal without permission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1153.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
